overview: VPL (Virtual Programming Lab) is an online platform and learning environment for teaching and practicing programming concepts through interactive coding exercises and assignments. It provides a virtual environment where students can write, compile, and test code, allowing educators to create programming labs and assessments in various programming languages.
core_features: Virtual programming environment for coding practice
Support for multiple programming languages and compilers
Assignment creation and grading tools for educators
Real-time feedback and automated testing of student submissions
